synopsis.text: The protagonist finds himself in a peculiar predicament when he is reborn as a dummy head microphone, a device designed to capture the full range of human hearing. This microphone becomes an integral part of a high school ASMR club, led by Yuri and her fellow classmates. The club members are on a mission to win the prestigious ASMR Koshien championship, a competition that celebrates the soothing, tingling sensations triggered by specific sounds or visuals. Follow the comedic journey of these high school girls and their unusual microphone in this slapstick anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
